task.title: Add User Tags to an Account
task.shortdesc: Add a User Tag to the account to apply User Badges.

step.cmd: Create Owners and Moderators through Studio to assign the Moderator User Tag to the account.
Create user groups, then add users to them through Studio to apply Tags with the group name to the selected users.
Apply User Tags directly to Accounts using the Add User Tag HTTP call or Ping for Pull.
